languages.text: {n}Воин устало вздыхает.{/n} "Мы не нападали на сей мир, мон-кай. Последние из детей Крудараха собрались вновь, дабы выжечь из памяти вселенной мастера плоти Тервантьяса — гемункула, что похищал и истязал провидцев с нашего мира-корабля. Мы узнали, что он скрывается на этом мире, однако нечто мешает нашим провидцам обнаружить его логово. И потому пришлось действовать... решительно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Воин устало вздыхает.{/n} "Мы не нападали на сей мир, мон-кай. Последние из детей Крудараха собрались вновь, дабы выжечь из памяти вселенной мастера плоти Тервантьяса — гемункула, что похищал и истязал провидцев с нашего мира-корабля. Мы узнали, что он скрывается на этом мире, однако нечто мешает нашим провидцам обнаружить его логово. И потому пришлось действовать... решительно".

languages.text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

languages.text: {n}El guerrero deja escapar un suspiro de hastío.{/n} «Nosotros no hemos invadido este mundo, elantach. Los últimos hijos de Crudarach se reunieron una vez más para borrar de la faz del universo al maestro de la carne Tervantias, el hemónculo que secuestró y torturó a los videntes de nuestro mundo astronave. Averiguamos que se oculta en este planeta, pero algo impide que nuestros videntes localicen su guarida. Así que nos hemos visto obligados a tomar medidas... decisivas».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero deja escapar un suspiro de hastío.{/n} «Nosotros no hemos invadido este mundo, elantach. Los últimos hijos de Crudarach se reunieron una vez más para borrar de la faz del universo al maestro de la carne Tervantias, el hemónculo que secuestró y torturó a los videntes de nuestro mundo astronave. Averiguamos que se oculta en este planeta, pero algo impide que nuestros videntes localicen su guarida. Así que nos hemos visto obligados a tomar medidas... decisivas».

languages.text: {n}这名战士疲惫地叹了口气。{/n}“我们并没有攻击这个世界，猴子。克鲁达拉赫最后的子嗣聚在一起，透过宇宙的记忆，寻找血肉大师特万提亚斯。那个血伶人绑架了我们方舟世界的先知，折磨他们。我们知道他就藏在这个世界中，但某种东西让我们的先知无法找到他的巢穴。所以我们不得不……果断行动。”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

traits.locale_text: {n}这名战士疲倦地叹了口气。{/n}“我们并没有攻击这个世界，猴子。克鲁达拉赫最后的子嗣聚在一起，透过宇宙的记忆，寻找血肉雕刻者特万提亚斯。那个血伶人绑架了我们方舟世界的先知，折磨他们。我们知道他就藏在这个世界中，但某种东西让我们的先知无法找到他的巢穴。所以我们不得不……果断行动。”

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier pousse un soupir las.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas attaqué ce monde, mon-keigh. Les derniers des enfants de Crudarach se sont rassemblés à nouveau pour purger la mémoire de l'univers de Tervantias, le maître de la chair, l'hémoncule qui a enlevé et torturé les Grands Prophètes de notre vaisseau-monde. Nous avons appris qu'il se cachait dans ce monde, mais quelque chose empêche nos Grands Prophètes de trouver son repaire. Ainsi, nous avons été contraints d'employer des mesures... décisives. »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier pousse un soupir las.{/n} « Nous n'avons pas attaqué ce monde, mon-keigh. Les derniers des enfants de Crudarach se sont rassemblés à nouveau pour purger la mémoire de l'univers de Tervantias, le maître de la chair, l'hémoncule qui a enlevé et torturé les prophètes de notre vaisseau-monde. Nous avons appris qu'il se cachait dans ce monde, mais quelque chose empêche nos prophètes de trouver son repaire. Ainsi, nous avons été contraints d'employer des mesures... décisives. »

languages.text: {n}戦士は疲れたようにため息をつく。{/n}「我々は、この世界を攻撃したのではない、モン＝ケイ。クルダラの子供たちの最後の一団が、宇宙の記憶から<屍肉の主>テルヴァンティアス ― 我らの予見者を方舟より拐かしたハモンキュラスを探し出すために再び集まったのだ。我らは、彼がこの世界に潜伏していることを知ったが、予見者たちが彼の隠れ家を発見するのを阻むものがあった。そのため、我々は断固たる行動を起こすことを余儀なくされたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士は疲れたようにため息をつく。{/n}「我々は、この世界を攻撃したのではない、モン＝ケイ。クルダラの子供たちの最後の一団が、宇宙の記憶から<屍肉の主>テルヴァンティアス ― 我らの予見者を方舟より拐かしたハモンキュラスを探し出すために再び集まったのだ。我らは、彼がこの世界に潜伏していることを知ったが、予見者たちが彼の隠れ家を発見するのを阻むものがあった。そのため、我々は断固たる行動を起こすことを余儀なくされたのだ」

languages.text: {n}Der Krieger seufzt erschöpft.{/n} "Wir haben diese Welt nicht angegriffen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Die letzten Kinder Crudarachs haben sich noch einmal versammelt, um den Fleischmeister Tervantias aus dem Gedächtnis des Universums zu tilgen — den Haemonculus, der die Runenpropheten von unserem Weltenschiff entführt und gefoltert hat. Wir haben erfahren, dass er sich auf dieser Welt versteckt, doch irgendetwas hindert unsere Runenpropheten daran, sein Versteck zu entdecken. Daher waren wir gezwungen ... entschlossen zu handeln."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krieger seufzt erschöpft.{/n} "Wir haben diese Welt nicht angegriffen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Die letzten Kinder Crudarachs haben sich noch einmal versammelt, um den Fleischmeister Tervantias aus dem Gedächtnis des Universums zu tilgen — den Haemonculus, der die Seher von unserem Weltenschiff entführt und gefoltert hat. Wir haben erfahren, dass er sich auf dieser Welt versteckt, doch irgendetwas hindert unsere Seher daran, sein Versteck zu entdecken. Daher waren wir gezwungen ... entschlossen zu handeln."

languages.text: {n}Savaşçı, yorgun bir hâlde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Biz bu dünyaya saldırmadık mon-keigh. Crudarach'ın hayatta kalan son çocukları, gemidünyamızdaki Ötesezenleri kaçırarak onlara işkence eden et üstadı Haimonkulus'u, yani Tervantias'ı evrendeki tüm hafızalardan kazımak için bir kez daha toplandı. Bu dünyada saklandığını öğrendik ancak Ötesezenlerimizin inini keşfetmesine bir şeyler engel oluyor. Biz de... Kararlılıkla harekete geçmek zorunda kaldık."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior sighs tiredly.{/n} "We did not attack this world, mon-keigh. The last of Crudarach's children assembled once more to scour the master of flesh Tervantias from the memory of the universe — the Haemonculus who abducted and tortured the Farseers from our craftworld. We learned that he is hiding on this world, but something prevents our Farseers from discovering his lair. And so we were forced to act... decisively."

Crudarach'ın hayatta kalan son çocukları, gemidünyamızdaki Ötesezenleri kaçırarak onlara işkence eden et üstadı Haimonkulus'u, yani Tervantias'ı evrendeki tüm hafızalardan kazımak için bir kez daha toplandı. Bu dünyada saklandığını öğrendik ancak Ötesezenlerimizin inini keşfetmesine bir şeyler engel oluyor. Biz de... Kararlılıkla harekete geçmek zorunda kaldık."
